member.name: F:SDK_Example.formScan2D.bTimerConnect
member.summary: Watch the USB connections: The timer is disabled when scanning, then enabled when idle. The interval of the timer is 500ms This example has two buttons to reflect the connections of the USB connectors. The name of each probe is printed inside the button. Push the button to switch probes.

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.EnableConnect
member.summary: To Start watching the USB connections

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.DisableConnect
member.summary: To Stop watching the USB connections

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.WatchConnect(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Initializes/clears HWControls

member.summary: Switches from one probe to another if there are multiple probes attached

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.UpdateProbesButtons
member.summary: Does nothing?

member.summary: Another way to check the connections. this is the one used

member.summary: Add a handler to detect arrival of devices.

member.summary: Add a handler to detect removal of devices.

member.summary: Called on arrival of any device. Calls a routine that searches to see if the desired device is present.

member.summary: Add handlers to detect device arrival and removal.

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.DeviceNotificationsStop
member.summary: Stop receiving notifications about device arrival and removal

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.DeviceRemoved(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Called on removal of any device. Calls a routine that searches to see if the desired device is still present.

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.CheckProbes
member.summary: Checks if the probe is currently connected to the computer

member.name: F:SDK_Example.formScan2D.bRobotTimerConnect
member.summary: Watch the comPort motor connections: The timer is disabled when the motor is connected. The interval of the timer is 500ms Modelled after the USB probe watch timer A different timer runs when the motor is connected to listen for communications with the motor We use two different timers to allow for different time intervals

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.EnableRobotConnectTimer
member.summary: To Start watching the SerialPort connections

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.DisableRobotConnectTimer
member.summary: To Stop watching the Serial Port connections

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.portTest
member.summary: Calls getComPortList to generate a list of comports

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.WatchRobotConnect(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Watches for when the robot connects When the robot does connect, it enables the robot listener and disables the robot connect timer

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.checkForQueryResponse
member.summary: Copy of robotListenerTimer_Tick but just accepts responses to the initial query

member.name: F:SDK_Example.formScan2D.preferredNames
member.summary: getComPortList hard-coding of 4, 5 and 7 as preferred comPorts workaround to prevent getting stuck on a virtual comPort this shouldn't be necessary now that we are querying the comport before accepting it as the correct on But no harm in keeping it in?

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.getComPortList
member.summary: Adds strings of comport names to comPortsList Always returns true

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.openComPort(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a comport

member.name: F:SDK_Example.formScan2D.bRobotListenerTimer
member.summary: Timer that listens for communications from the motor The timer is disabled when the motor is disconnected. The interval of the timer is 100ms A different timer runs when the motor is disconnected to listen for motor reconnection We use two different timers to allow for different time intervals

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.EnableRobotListener
member.summary: To Listen for communications from the robot

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.DisableRobotListener
member.summary: Stops Listening for communications from the robot

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.RobotListenerTimer_Tick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Tells the scanner and robot what to do according to what the Arduino sends to the computer MaxSteps and CurSteps are counted here MaxCine is later set to MaxSteps, size of the ArrayList holding all of the images in a scan is set to MaxCine

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.writeResponseCodes
member.summary: Saves a log file of what the Arduino sends back to the computer

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.SetButtonForRobotState(SDK_Example.formScan2D.RobotStateEnum)
member.summary: Changes the circle indicator on the button "Robot Scan" when the state of the robot changes

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.StopRobot
member.summary: Sends a "l" to the Arduino to stop the robot

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.queryRobotState
member.summary: Sends a "D" to the Arduino to check the robot's state

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.StartRobot
member.summary: Sends an "m" to the Arduino to start the robot

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.rewindRobot
member.summary: Rewinds the robot

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.robotConnectionLost
member.summary:
All the things we have to do when the robot disconnects But we are not shutting down the robot
Closes the comports Sets the robot state to disconnected Disables the robot listener

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.setRobotSpeed(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set motor speed to a percentage of maximum Max speed is 70 rpm while scanning RPM = 2 * Robot_Speed + 20 rpm

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.DoSaveRobotScanDataAsText(System.String)
member.summary: Saves a .txt file that has the values used for Depth, Frequency, High Voltage, Main Gain, Dynamic, Etc

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.DoSaveRobotScanRaw(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Save the raw data for one image of the 3D scan: essentially copied from DoSaveRaw but with the .dat part pulled out and reads the image from the saved BytArray
Only used to call SaveBmpFromRaw

member.name: M:SDK_Example.formScan2D.SaveBmpFromRaw(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: copied from DrawOut to create the bmp from a raw file without changing the graphics
